pageProduct.name: Palmers Cocoa Butter Skin Therapy Oil Value Pack 150ml+60ml
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Palmer's® Cocoa Butter Formula Skin Therapy Oil is a lightweight formula which helps to improve the appearance of scars, stretch marks, dry, damaged skin, uneven skin and ageing skin. Rich in essential fatty acids, vitamins and antioxidants for all over skin perfecting benefits.

Warnings

For external use only. Keep out of reach of children. Avoid contact with eyes.

Common Uses

93% of women tested saw a reduction in the appearance of scars. 92% of women tested saw a reduction in the appearance of stretch marks. *Based on an 8 week in home user trial by 200 female panelists. Formulated with a blend of Cocoa Butter, Vitamin E, Pure Argan Oil, Natural Oils and Cetesomate-E® Complex, leaving skin deeply moisturised. Non-greasy formula. Hypoallergenic. Dermatologist Tested. Paraben and Phthalate Free.

Ingredients

Canola Oil, Isopropyl Myristate, Cetearyl Ethylhexanoate, Sesamum Indicum (Sesame) Seed Oil, Theobroma Cacao (Cocoa) Seed Butter, Argania Spinosa Kernel Oil, Tocopherol, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Dimethicone, Rosa Canina Fruit Oil, Fragrance (Parfum).

Directions

Gently massage into affected area 3 times daily or as often as desired.
